text:
Stop using ChatGPT to seek information.

This is a much better combo:

1. Use Perplexity Pro.
2. Make sure to use "Research".
3. Copy and paste this prompt below:

“I need [specific fact/criteria] about [subject] as of [date/today/timeframe]. Give the answer, key caveats, and what to double-check.”

For example, I love using this for viral topics:

“I need the top 3 viral AI startup stories as of today. Give the answer, key caveats (such as disputed details or unconfirmed reports), and what to double-check before posting.”

Perplexity will search real-time news, link direct sources, and flag possible issues (like if a stat is outdated or a report comes from a single source).
